title: Bug 15899 - 'Close All Saved' does not consistently work
description: The 'Close All Saved' feature is not functioning as expected in build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, I observed that after creating a new file 'f1.txt', selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu results in nothing happening.
EB: I expected that when I select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, all open editors should be closed, and any unsaved changes in those editors should prompt a save dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the software using build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Create a new file, for example, 'f1.txt'.
3. Go to the file menu.
4. Select 'Close All Saved'.
5. Observe that nothing happens, and all open editors are not closed as expected.
